name: Laure Gonnord
content: Laure Gonnord's webpage Welcome ! Since September 2021 I'm Full Professor at Grenoble INP, in the LCIS laboratory and Esisar Engineer School in Valence (France). From September 2013 to Aug 2021, I was Associate Professor at University of Lyon and ENS Lyon/LIP Lab, and from 2018 in the CASH team of the LIP. Formerly (2009-2013), I was Associate Professor at Polytech'Lille/University of Lille/LIFL.
